item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 19 Apr 2022
item.description:
1. Lwt informal user survey
  2. pyml_bindgen: a CLI app to generate Python bindings directly from OCaml value specifications
  3. Creating a library for use from JS with js_of_ocaml
  4. ocaml-lsp-server 1.11.0
  5. OCaml summer school in Spain, call for industry speakers
  6. Dune 3.1.0
